description:
Module for creating real servers, service group and vip on AX devices.
 		Apply to a node that can reach the A10 through https.
		For more information run puppet describe on each resource.
		Be aware that the providers attempt to save the configuration (e.g. wr mem) but this
		might not work on older versions of the A10 software.
		Thunder ACOS software minimum version: 4.0.0.
		Compatible aXapi version 3.0
		Copyright 2015, A10 Networks provided as is
		Tested on Puppet 3.8.2
author: A10Networks

types.name: axserver

parameters.name: name
parameters.doc: Common name of the real server

parameters.name: axdevice
parameters.doc: Name or ip address  of the A10 device to configure

parameters.name: ipaddress
parameters.doc: Ip address of the real server

types.doc: Custom type for handling A10 real servers

properties.name: ensure
properties.doc: The basic property that the resource should be in.  Valid values are `present`, `absent`.

types.name: axvip

parameters.name: axdevice
parameters.doc: Name or ip address  of the A10 device to configure

parameters.name: ssltemplate
parameters.doc: Name of the ssl/tls client template to use (should be created in advance)

parameters.name: natpool
parameters.doc: Name of the nat pool template to use (if omitted no nat pool is used or created)

types.doc: Custom type for handling A10 vips

properties.name: ensure
properties.doc: The basic property that the resource should be in.  Valid values are `present`, `absent`.

types.name: axsvcgroup

parameters.name: axdevice
parameters.doc: Name or ip address  of the A10 device to configure

parameters.name: healthmon
parameters.doc: Healthmonitor to use for the servicegroup

types.doc: Custom type for handling A10 servicegroups

properties.name: ensure
properties.doc: The basic property that the resource should be in.  Valid values are `present`, `absent`.

name: A10Networks-vThunder
